root.name: Jumpgate: The Reconstruction Initiative
root.description: OverviewJumpgate: The Reconstruction Initiative is a space combat MMO in which players pilot spacecraft. Players accumulate wealth through mining, trade, and combat. Funds are used to purchase upgrades for their craft. The game divides space into sectors containing asteroids and space stations. Travel between sectors takes place via jumpgates.Gameplay Features PvP CombatPvE CombatMiningManufacturingTradingPersistant Universe encompassing over 150 sectors3 playable factions2 non-playable factionsJoystick support
